data.title: The biggest Italian football news site
data.meta_description: Serie A news updated throughout the day, from the top sources in Italy covering Italian football, brought to you by Football Italia
data.text:
Lazio seek loan deal for out-of-favour Napoli winger

Lazio have reportedly lodged an enquiry with Napoli over a potential loan deal for out-of-favour winger Cyril Ngonge, just a few months after he arrived at the Stadio Maradona. Lazio…

Video: Milan 2-2 Torino Serie A highlights

Watch as Milan stage a last-gasp comeback from 2-0 down to draw with Torino, as Alvaro Morata and Noah Okafor rescue the Rossoneri from a strange Malick Thiaw own goal…

Palladino hints at Fiorentina future for Amrabat and Nico Gonzalez

Raffaele Palladino admits he would like to keep Sofyan Amrabat at Fiorentina, while ‘the club will decide’ over Nico Gonzalez after the season began with a stalemate. The Viola opened…

Logan Costa: Bologna negotiating with Toulouse in hunt for Calafiori replacement

Bologna have reportedly been in contact with representatives from Ligue 1 side Toulouse to discuss the price tag for centre-back Logan Costa, who the Rossoblu are targeting as a replacement…

Fonseca defends Milan starting XI, but team was ‘too passive’

Paulo Fonseca defends his choice of starting XI after Milan substitutes transformed the game against Torino. ‘We need to get them back to full fitness. The team was too passive…

Morata: ‘Milan comeback sent a message, this team was dead’

Alvaro Morata feels the comeback from 2-0 down to hold Torino 2-2 still ‘sends a message’ because Milan were ‘practically dead and would’ve won with another five minutes.’ The Rossoneri…

Serie A | Milan 2-2 Torino: Player ratings – Subs save shoddy Rossoneri defence

Paulo Fonseca’s second-half substitutions had to bail the rest of the team out during Milan’s 2-2 draw at home with Torino on the opening day of the Serie A season,…

Serie A | Milan 2-2 Torino: Morata and Okafor rescue Rossoneri

Milan completed a desperate comeback from 2-0 down at the 89th minute to hold Torino 2-2 at San Siro with Alvaro Morata and Noah Okafor, but Paulo Fonseca has a…

Serie A | Empoli 0-0 Monza: A point apiece

Empoli and Monza shared the spoils at the Stadio Castellani, largely thanks to the saves of Semuel Pizzignacco. Alberto Grassi and coach Roberto D’Aversa were suspended for the hosts, plus…

Bastoni criticises lack of ‘real’ holiday between Italy fixtures and Inter start

Inter and Italy defender Alessandro Bastoni has criticised the lack of a ‘real’ break he and some of his colleagues were afforded between the Euros and Copa America this summer…

Inzaghi: ‘A team like Inter shouldn’t concede goals like that’

Simone Inzaghi was critical of Inter’s inability to keep their lead after the team’s 2-2 draw with Genoa in the first Serie A match of the 2024-25 season, but feels…

Serie A | Genoa 2-2 Inter: Player ratings – Marvellous Thuram not enough for Nerazzurri

Check out the player ratings from Saturday's entertaining 2-2 draw between Genoa and reigning Serie A champions Inter. Genoa 2-2 Inter: Player ratings Genoa Gollini 7 - A handful of…

Serie A Wk 1 Liveblog: Genoa-Inter, Milan-Torino, Parma-Fiorentina and more

This was a Live Blog! Check back soon for more live coverage!

Serie A | Genoa 2-2 Inter: Dramatic Marassi comeback stuns champions

Inter begin the defence of their Scudetto with a dramatic 2-2 draw at Marassi, as Marcus Thuram’s brace and a Yann Sommer penalty save were not enough to deny plucky…

Serie A | Parma 1-1 Fiorentina: Viola scrape stalemate

Only a remarkable Cristiano Biraghi free kick allowed Fiorentina to scrape a point away to newly-promoted Parma, despite the Marin Pongracic red card, after Dennis Man’s opener and wasted chances.…

Done deal: Atalanta agree deal with Udinese for Samardzic

Atalanta have now agreed a deal with Udinese for the transfer of Serbia international Lazar Samardzic according to reports in Italy. La Dea have reached an agreement over a €20m…

Ibrahimovic admits Milan still following Kone despite Fofana signing

Zlatan Ibrahimovic has confessed that Milan are still following France and Borussia Mönchengladbach midfielder Manu Kone, despite welcoming Youssouf Fofana to the club on Saturday and announcing that the Rossoneri…

Serie A official line-ups: Milan vs. Torino

Luka Jovic gets the nod with Samuel Chukwueze, Rafael Leao and Christian Pulisic in Milan’s new 4-2-3-1 formation against Torino. It kicks off at San Siro at 19.45 UK time…

De Rossi gives new Roma striker Dovbyk same instructions as former loanee Lukaku

Daniele De Rossi has explained that not too much has changed in his tactical set-up after replacing 2023-24 loanee Romelu Lukaku with new signing Artem Dovbyk, who arrived on a…
